alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts, Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued July 05 at 3:05AM MST until July 06 at 8:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR MOHAVE COUNTY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR MOHAVE COUNTY... * AFFECTED AREA...In Arizona...Fire weather zone 102. * TIMING...11 am until 8 pm MST Thursday. * WIND...South to southwest wind 15 to 25 mph with gusts approaching 40 mph. * HUMIDITY...Minimum humidity values 5 to 10 percent. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
